actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from State.

official_title: To provide for the payment of rewards for the return of Vietnam POW/MIAs and to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the designation on income tax forms of overpayments of tax and contributions to pay for such rewards.

summary.text: Vietnam POW/MIA Rescue Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to authorize individuals to designate one dollar of overpayment or a cash contribution on income tax forms to the Vietnam POW/MIA Rescue Fund. Establishes such Fund to make payments to individuals as rewards for delivering into the custody of the U.S. Government a living Vietnam POW/MIA. Authorizes the granting of political asylum to individuals receiving rewards.

titles.title: To provide for the payment of rewards for the return of Vietnam POW/MIAs and to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the designation on income tax forms of overpayments of tax and contributions to pay for such rewards.
